001package edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.model.entity;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude.Include;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty.Access;
008import jakarta.persistence.CascadeType;
009import jakarta.persistence.Column;
010import jakarta.persistence.Entity;
011import jakarta.persistence.FetchType;
012import jakarta.persistence.GeneratedValue;
013import jakarta.persistence.Id;
014import jakarta.persistence.Index;
015import jakarta.persistence.OneToMany;
016import jakarta.persistence.OrderBy;
017import jakarta.persistence.PrePersist;
018import jakarta.persistence.Table;
019import java.util.LinkedList;
020import java.util.List;
021import java.util.UUID;
022
023@Entity
024@Table(
025    indexes = {
026        @Index(columnList = "active,name")
027    }
028)
029@JsonInclude(Include.NON_NULL)
030public class Channel {
031
032  @Id
033  @GeneratedValue
034  @Column(name = "channel_id", nullable = false, updatable = false)
035  @JsonIgnore
036  private long id;
037
038  @Column(nullable = false, updatable = false, unique = true)
039  @JsonProperty(value = "key", access = Access.READ_ONLY)
040  private UUID externalKey;
041
042  @Column(nullable = false, updatable = false, unique = true, length = 50)
043  private String name;
044  
045  @Column(nullable = false, updatable = true)
046  private boolean active;
047
048  @OneToMany(mappedBy = "channel", fetch = FetchType.LAZY, 
049      cascade = CascadeType.ALL, orphanRemoval = true)
050  @OrderBy("posted ASC")
051  @JsonIgnore
052  private final List<Message> messages = new LinkedList<>();
053  
054  public long getId() {
055    return id;
056  }
057
058  public UUID getExternalKey() {
059    return externalKey;
060  }
061
062  public String getName() {
063    return name;
064  }
065
066  public void setName(String name) {
067    this.name = name;
068  }
069
070  public boolean isActive() {
071    return active;
072  }
073
074  public void setActive(boolean active) {
075    this.active = active;
076  }
077
078  public List<Message> getMessages() {
079    return messages;
080  }
081
082  @Override
083  public int hashCode() {
084    return Long.hashCode(id);
085  }
086
087  @Override
088  public boolean equals(Object obj) {
089    boolean result;
090    if (obj == this) {
091      result = true;
092    } else if (obj instanceof Channel other) {
093      result = (id != 0 && id == other.id);
094    } else {
095      result = false;
096    }
097    return result;
098  }
099  
100  @PrePersist
101  void generateFieldValues() {
102    externalKey = UUID.randomUUID();
103  }
104  
105}
